name: PHP & MySQL
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /workspaces/lamp/php/phpmyadmin/tmp/ && service mariadb start && mariadb -u root < ./.devcontainer/.config/grant-privileges.sql &&  mv /var/www/html/phpmyadmin/phpMyAdmin-5.1.1-all-languages/* /workspaces/lamp/php/phpmyadmin/ && service apache2 start && a2ensite 000-default && php ./php/seed.php
postStartCommand: chown -R www-data:www-data /workspaces/lamp/php/phpmyadmin/tmp/ && chmod 755 /workspaces/lamp/php/phpmyadmin/tmp/ && chown -R www-data:www-data /workspaces/lamp/php && find /workspaces/lamp/php -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; && find /workspaces/lamp/php -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \;
